item.title: Flipsides - Unissued & Rare Northern Soul - ( vol 3 )
item.description: Dee Brown & Lola Grant kicks of this RARE set, The Lamp Sisters and their underplayed (You Caught Me Napping) is followed by The Chantels Top-Tune (Indian Giver) It's the Summer of 1967 next with Benny Lattimore & his superb (Girl I Got News For You) Margie Hendrix , Jimmy Dobbins & Anna Kings ( Mamas Got A Bag of her Own) closes out the first set. Vernon & Jewell and their ULTRA RARE spin (Rocking Good Way) gives the Mid set a kick start into The Olympics and their Fatboy Slim inspired ( I'll Do A Little Bit More). The Loma label is up next with Linda Jones and ( I Cant Stand It). I was sent a 2009 NS Tune from Myron and the Soul Investigators ( Cold Game ) its so good i had to include it on this release, Can you spot this superbly produced NS Inspired spin? 'The Duke of Earl' Mr Gene Chandler close's out the mid set. Brunswick's Inez Foxx and their (Broken Hearted Fool) starts the mellow wind down into Trinikas and their sublime ( Remember Me) Debbie Taylor and her Underground Smash ( Let Him Know) Barbara Lynn , Inell Young , & Wendy Rene who gave us BBQ closes out the mix with (After Laughter).... enjoy Mark ( chit-chat and patter free - download, burn & enjoy)
item.dc:creator: Soul Server

Vernon & Jewell and their ULTRA RARE spin (Rocking Good Way) gives the Mid set a kick start into The Olympics and their Fatboy Slim inspired ( I'll Do A Little Bit More). The Loma label is up next with Linda Jones and ( I Cant Stand It). I was sent a 2009 NS Tune from Myron and the Soul Investigators ( Cold Game ) its so good i had to include it on this release, Can you spot this superbly produced NS Inspired spin? 'The Duke of Earl' Mr Gene Chandler close's out the mid set.
Brunswick's Inez Foxx and their (Broken Hearted Fool) starts the mellow wind down into Trinikas and their sublime ( Remember Me) Debbie Taylor and her Underground Smash ( Let Him Know) Barbara Lynn , Inell Young , & Wendy Rene who gave us BBQ closes out the mix with (After Laughter).... enjoy Mark ( chit-chat and patter free - download, burn & enjoy)

item.title: Two Handfuls of Northern Soul, Flipsides & Rare Spins
item.description: The Weekend Mix vol 6 ( Two Handfuls of Northern Soul, Flipsides & Rare Spins) Etta James and her Powerful (Somethings Got a hold on Me) kicks off the set, The Companions and their rare spin ( Be Yourself ) is followed by the Wonderettes and the rare NS Spin ( I Feel Strange). love it or hate it, Rocky Fellers and their brillant (KILLER JOE) close out the first set. The Second set keeps it right there in NS Bliss with The Mirrets and (He's Alright With Me) together with Mamie Galore and her Uptempo (It Aint Necessary). The Vastly underplayed Lost Souls (Secret OF Mine) and Donna Kings ( Take Me Home) close out the mid-set. As usual the final set contains some downtempo NS Classics and a drop of R&B crossover from Joe Diamond ( Dont Set Me Back) A Billy Stewart double (Look Back & Smile) and (Sitting In The Park) followed by the sublime Checkmates and their perfect (Black Pearl) and Jerry Butler close out the mix... enjoy.. Mark (Dj silence) http://www.soulserver.eu
item.dc:creator: Soul Server
item.itunes:summary:

Etta James and her Powerful (Somethings Got a hold on Me) kicks off the set, The Companions and their rare spin ( Be Yourself ) is followed by the Wonderettes and the rare NS Spin ( I Feel Strange). love it or hate it, Rocky Fellers and their brillant (KILLER JOE) close out the first set.
The Second set keeps it right there in NS Bliss with The Mirrets and (He's Alright With Me) together with Mamie Galore and her Uptempo (It Aint Necessary). The Vastly underplayed Lost Souls (Secret OF Mine) and Donna Kings ( Take Me Home) close out the mid-set.
As usual the final set contains some downtempo NS Classics and a drop of R&B crossover from Joe Diamond ( Dont Set Me Back) A Billy Stewart double (Look Back & Smile) and (Sitting In The Park) followed by the sublime Checkmates and their perfect (Black Pearl) and Jerry Butler close out the mix... enjoy..

item.title: The Weekend Mix ( Vol 5 ) - Rare and Seductive Northern Soul.
item.description: The Opening Set has Betty Swan , Patty and the Emblems with their ( Mixed Up , Shook Up Girl) Dickie Wonder and the brilliant (Nobody Knows) together with The Okaysons and The Dynamics. The Mid Set has Geno Washington , The Epitome of Sound plus a RARE SPIN from Cliff Nobles with (Judge Baby) , Skull Snaps and a couple of flipsides follow. The Final Set has Baby Washington, The Shirelle's (Baby It's You) Clyde McPhatter and Arthur Conley close out the mix. enjoy... Mark ( Dj silence ) http://www.soulserver.eu
item.dc:creator: Soul Server
item.itunes:summary:
The Opening Set has Betty Swan , Patty and the Emblems with their ( Mixed Up , Shook Up Girl) Dickie Wonder and the brilliant (Nobody Knows) together with The Okaysons and The Dynamics.
The Mid Set has Geno Washington , The Epitome of Sound plus a RARE SPIN from Cliff Nobles with (Judge Baby) , Skull Snaps and a couple of flipsides follow.
The Final Set has Baby Washington, The Shirelle's (Baby It's You) Clyde McPhatter and Arthur Conley close out the mix.
enjoy...

item.title: Flipsides - Unissued - & Rare Northern Soul ( vol.2 )
item.description:
Flipsides - Unissued - & Rare Northern Soul ( vol.2 ) -
Harold Melvin & The Bluenotes kicks off the set, closely followed by Bobby Hill's (Tell Me You Love Me) and Bobby Boyd's crossover (The Look Of Love). The Precisions - and their ULTRA RARE Spin ( I Do, Dont You ) is thrown in for good measure. The Mid Set has David Morris's brilliant Flipside ( Stoned On Love ) Art & Honey's Superb ( Shake Well Before You Use Me) plus the UNISSUED Hermon Hitson and (Love Has Slipped Through My Fingers) The final set slips into some Blissful B SIDE Spins from The Candi Bars & (You're The One) plus The Soul Generation and their delightful (Sailing). The Light Drivers and their classic tune (Dream of a Shoeshine Boy) plus a couple of Flipside treasures close out the mix. enjoy.... Mark ( Dj silence ) http://www.soulserver.eu
item.dc:creator: Soul Server

Flipsides - Unissued - & Rare Northern Soul ( vol.2 ) -
Harold Melvin & The Bluenotes kicks off the set, closely followed by Bobby Hill's (Tell Me You Love Me) and Bobby Boyd's crossover (The Look Of Love). The Precisions - and their ULTRA RARE Spin ( I Do, Dont You ) is thrown in for good measure.
The Mid Set has David Morris's brilliant Flipside ( Stoned On Love ) Art & Honey's Superb ( Shake Well Before You Use Me) plus the UNISSUED Hermon Hitson and (Love Has Slipped Through My Fingers)
The final set slips into some Blissful B SIDE Spins from The Candi Bars & (You're The One) plus The Soul Generation and their delightful (Sailing). The Light Drivers and their classic tune (Dream of a Shoeshine Boy) plus a couple of Flipside treasures close out the mix.
enjoy....

item.title: The Weekend Mix ( vol 4 ) - Rare Crossover and Seductive Northern Soul.
item.description: The Weekend Mix ( vol 4) Rare Crossover and Seductive Northern Soul. Percy Millem's (Call On Me) kicks off the set, followed by 2 requests from The Capitols & The Precisions. The Mid set has a few crossover spins plus Tim Jacobs brilliant (Mercy) - The set continues with Hannibal, Clay Hammond & others before slipping into some blissful soul from Ketty Lester and her Seductive (Please Dont Cry). enjoy... Mark ( Dj silence ) http://www.soulserver.eu
item.dc:creator: Soul Server

item.title: The Weekend Mix ( vol 3 ) - Rare and Seductive Northern Soul
item.description: (The Weekend Mix vol 3) Rare and Seductive Northern Soul. Johnny McCall kicks of the set with (You Cant Get Away) closely followed by Willie Jones (Wheres my Money )The Mid set has a few rare spins plus Little Flint and the brilliant (Pain) - the set continues with a handful of Popcorn Soul followed by some blissful classics from Tony Middleton and Annabelle Fox. enjoy... Mark ( Dj silence ) http://www.soulserver.eu

item.title: Flipsides - Unissued - & Rare Northern Soul ( vol.1 ) - FIXED!
item.description: Chit/Chat and Patter free - Dj silence presents the best Flipside's and Unissued Vinyl with a drop of Rare Northern Soul ( vol.1 ) Mid-Set kicks off with the Legendary 'Kings go forth' and the massive 'One Day' followed by a brilliant spin from 'The Cards' - 'aint no brag'. the set carries on with some of the best Uptempo flipside's and Northern Soul rarities - enjoy... Mark ( Dj silence ) @ http://www.soulserver.eu
